projectsDescription: Made a scientific calculator out of HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Learnt Math.js framework and about API's.

This is a software I made for the Hack It Out hackathon. It's basically a software to manage coaching classes. Frontend part has been done, but backend work is left. Learnt many frameworks while working on this project.
This is a website I made for my father's coaching classes when I was in 12th grade. Made it with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Used Google maps API too.
An this is my portfolio which I made in React js. This is my first project in React js. I learnt this amazing framework while working on my portfolio project.
